Joel Carlson MSc student, Seoul National University

My name is Joel Carlson, I'm an MSc student in the Biomedical Radiation Sciences program at Seoul National University. Broadly, my research interests include Monte Carlo methods, machine learning applications, and creating tools for improving radiotherapy. When not working on research I occasionally compete in Kaggle competitions, and am almost always working through a course or two on Coursera. Click the icon beside my name to learn more!

I am the developer of the radiomics package, take a look on CRAN or on github. Contributions welcome!

The lab I am affiliated with has a website, check it out: Radiological Physics Lab

Get in touch via: Github, Facebook, or LinkedIn
